details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.7.3 Artefacts - Remapped standard types
details.description: Standard tags shall not be remapped to a non-standard type

rule.description: Standard tags shall not be remapped to a non-standard type

error.message: The standard structure type %1 is remapped to a non-standard type
